movements.description: Lean back to tap heels on the wall and return to balance.

movements.description: Handstand or inversion-related movement: Kick-up practice (controlled entry to wall).

movements.description: Kick up softly to the wall, touch lightly, and return to standing.

movements.name: Palm Lifts
movements.description: Lift the palm while keeping fingers on the floor to strengthen the fingers and wrists.

movements.description: Core control movement: Standing oblique brace.

movements.description: Standing bracing drill teaching hollow-body rib position.

movements.description: Plank variation with knees tucked to emphasise core compression.

movements.name: Wall plank
movements.description: Plank position with feet on the wall and hands on the floor.

movements.name: Wall slides (Y overhead motions)

movements.name: Wall walk to halfway
movements.description: Walk feet up the wall to a partial inverted position.

movements.description: Walk up and down the wall from plank into a near-vertical position.

movements.description: Wall walks stopping before fully vertical to reduce intensity.

movements.name: Wall walks to ¾ height
movements.description: Wall walks stopping before fully vertical to reduce intensity.

movements.description: Wall walks plus small hand steps to introduce walking mechanics.

movements.name: Wrist Rocks
movements.description: Shift weight forward and back over the hands to build wrist strength and tolerance.

movements.name: Wrist conditioning
movements.description: Wrist preparation drill: Wrist conditioning.

movements.name: Wrist rocks
movements.description: Shift weight forward and back over the hands to build wrist strength and tolerance.

movements.name: Wrist weight-shifts
movements.description: Wrist preparation drill: Wrist weight-shifts.

movements.name: Strict press-ups
movements.description: Full-range strict press-ups from floor with tight body line.

movements.name: Incline press-ups
movements.description: Hands-elevated press-ups used as a regression towards full press-ups.

movements.name: Bench dips
movements.description: Dip variation with hands on a bench to build tricep and shoulder strength.

movements.name: Band-assisted dips
movements.description: Dips performed with band assistance to reduce bodyweight load.

movements.name: Strict dips
movements.description: Full-range bodyweight dips on parallel bars or rings.

movements.name: Strict pull-ups
movements.description: Pull-ups performed without kipping to build back and arm strength.
